primevc.gui.styling.IStyleBlock

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IInvalidatable

Instance Variables

allFilledProperties(default,null) : Int

bit-flag with the filled properties of this style-object and it's extended, super, inherited and parent style.

filledProperties(default,null) : Int

Variable defining which properties in the style-declaration have been set or not according to the flags of the style-declaration.

Instance Methods

doesntHave(propFlag : Int) : Bool

has(propFlag : Int) : Bool

isEmpty() : Bool

owns(propFlag : Int) : Bool

updateAllFilledPropertiesFlag() : Void

Method which will update the flags in allFilledProperties when it's style or that of it's extended, super, inherited and parent style changes.
